source:
%%pyspark
# Fetch session token
with open("/opt/token-service/tokenservice.config.json") as f:
    sessionToken = f.read()

%%pyspark
# Fetch cluster id
with open("/etc/bbc/cluster-name") as f:
    clusterId = f.read()

%%pyspark
import requests
import json

sessionTokenJObj = json.loads(sessionToken)
tokenServiceUrl = sessionTokenJObj["tokenServiceEndpoint"]
fullUrl = "{0}/api/v1/proxy/subscriptions/4e1adcf4-0906-4efe-bd5d-3659241ab819/resourceGroups/parask/providers/Microsoft.Synapse/workspaces/paraskbrazilsouth/hms/databases/DB1/fetch?api-version=2019-06-01-preview".format(tokenServiceUrl)
headers = {
    'x-ms-proxy-host': 'https://rpbrazilsouth.svc.datafactory.azure.com:44433', # SyMS endpoint
    'x-ms-cluster-identifier': clusterId,
    'Authorization': sessionTokenJObj['sessionToken'],
    'Metadata': 'true'
}

payload = {'ArtifactName': 'DB1', 'HmsRuntimeProperties': { 'SparkSessionToken': sessionTokenJObj['sessionToken'] } }
response = requests.post(fullUrl, json=payload, headers=headers)

print(response)
print(response.text)
